page.title: 20Pride in King's Sutton
page.content: All the people we met seemed to like living in King's Sutton. They found it a friendly place and most of them enjoyed using the village shops. There is a good choice of shopping for a village. The whole village looks well cared for and they are proud of the lovely old part of the village, the play-ground and the sports-fields and they take a pride in keeping it all tidy. We thought there was a lot to do in the village: many Evening Classes as well as several clubs and groups run by volunteers; something for everyone. _____________ This part of the Project was prepared by the girls of the sixth form of Overthorpe Hall Preparatory School.
